raw akas.title: A Verdade por Trás do Crime

akas: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (original title)
A Verdade por Trás do Crime Brazil
Los casos de Aphrodita Jones Spain
akas from release info: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (original title)
A Verdade por Trás do Crime Brazil
Los casos de Aphrodita Jones Spain

1.title: Discreet House Cleaning

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: A young woman with a new job and on the verge of marriage is found dead in her home with her throat slit and "#1" scrawled on the wall in lipstick. Is she the first of many who will fall prey to a serial killer?

2.title: A Murder & an Open Marriage

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: The investigation of the murder of a married woman is stymied due to the main suspect-the husband-seemingly having a solid alibi: He was away sailing. The case is cracked, however, with the help of a fourteen year old girl.

3.title: Road to Nowhere

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: A long haul trucker disappears just before New Years'. Thirteen years later a tax fuel auditor goes missing. The investigation into one case expands into another, and police uncover one of the most bizarre and grizzly crime scenes they've ever seen.

4.title: Sex, Drugs, and Murder

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: 38 year-old Danny Coleman's charred remains are discovered 50 miles from home, and the investigation to hunt down his killers will take almost two decades and involve sex, drugs, and a voice reaching out from the grave.

5.title: Blood Brotherhood

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: The close friendship between two frat brothers ends in murder.

6.title: Homicide in the Heartland

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: When 21-year-old Rose Goggins goes missing, leaving her 1-year-old son behind, police have a gut feeling something is terribly wrong. They soon find her car, but not her body. Now, the only thing more shocking than what happens to Rose is who did it.

7.title: A Deadly Dream

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Tolbert, 63, was shot and killed in 2008 while working a second job, cleaning a coin laundry at night. The case went unsolved for two years.

8.title: Head Case

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: A young woman is killed and her live-in boyfriend fights for his life after being shot twice in the head. As a close-knit family struggles to cope with their sister's senseless murder, they're shocked to learn the sad secret she took to her grave.

9.title: Burning Man

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: The charred body of an unidentified man was discovered by a logger in a remote part of northern Florida. The man was burned beyond recognition, and the crime scene required painstaking police work. Police were concerned they would never be able to identify the victim because both of his hands were severely burnt and his facial features were unrecognizable. Who was this man? And why would anyone want him dead?

10.title: Too Young to Die

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: When 15 year old Annie Kasprzak was found brutally murdered, her foster parents were devastated. It would take a dedicated rookie detective shifting through false leads and digital forensics to uncover the shocking truth of what happened to Annie.

1.title: Scott Peterson

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Laci Peterson and her unborn child are found floating in the San Francisco Bay. Her husband Scott is convicted of killing her. But crime writer Aphrodite Jones finds there is much more to this story than what is in the headlines.

2.title: O.J. Simpson

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: The Las Vegas kidnapping case that put former football great O.J. Simpson in jail was one of many highly publicized Simpson cases with a singular theme - rage. Crime Writer Aphrodite Jones uncovers new information about the fall of an icon.

3.title: Staircase Killer: Michael Peterson

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: The wife of a novelist turns up dead at the bottom of a staircase and her husband is convicted of killing her. But did he? Crime writer Aphrodite Jones goes behind prison walls to confront Michael Peterson to find out if he killed his wife.

4.title: Phil Spector

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: An actress turns up dead at the home of Phil Spector and the music legend is charged with murder. Crime writer Aphrodite Jones uncovers videotape that Spector hoped would clear his name, but instead is a damning self-portrait.

5.title: Zodiac

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: The Zodiac is the most notorious serial killer in California history and for forty years his identity has remained unknown. Now, crime writer Aphrodite Jones follows his bloody trail to try to find the killer's true identity.

6.title: San Francisco Dog Mauling

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Two vicious dogs savagely kill a 33-year-old woman in a San Francisco apartment building. As crime writer Aphrodite Jones follows this bizarre story, she uncovers a world of prison gangs and animal cruelty that led to murder.

7.title: The Menendez Brothers

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Two brothers murder their wealthy parents. Authorities say it was for money. The brothers say it was out of fear. Now, crime writer Aphrodite Jones talks with some who know the story - and believe what the Menendez brothers say may be true.

8.title: Michael Jackson

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: He was one of the world's greatest entertainers. But for the past twenty years Michael Jackson was haunted by allegations of child abuse. Crime writer Aphrodite Jones sets out to prove those charges were as responsible for his early death as drugs.

9.title: Skylar Deleon

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: In Orange County, California, crime writer Aphrodite Jones goes on the hunt for a missing couple. What she discovers is a horrifying web of deceit that is the foundation for one of the most disturbing crimes California has ever seen.

10.title: Chandra Levy

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: When Washington, D.C. intern Chandra Levy goes missing, a U.S. congressman falls under suspicion. Crime writer Aphrodite Jones examines the story's media circus, the life of Levy and what really happened to her in Washington.

1.title: JonBenet Ramsey: The Innocent

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: If JonBenet Ramsey had lived, she'd be a junior in college. More than 14 years have passed after the murder and her case continues to baffle investigators. Aphrodite Jones digs for answers to a case that has raised a lot of questions.

2.title: Anna Nicole Smith: Tragedy on Trial

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Was it a murder, an overdose, or an accident? The mysterious life and tragic death of blonde bombshell Anna Nicole Smith is profiled. Aphrodite examines the death of Anna Nicole and possible ties to her young son's own tragic death.

3.title: Rodney Alcala: Killer Contestant

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Rodney Alcala was a real-life ladykiller. At times charming, Rodney hid his disturbed personality behind a photographer's lens, using this guise to lure and attract unsuspecting women into his web of murder.

4.title: Scott Rothstein: Loyalty, Lies and Loss

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Scott Rothstein was a successful businessman in Fort Lauderdale until a promising young lawyer at his law firm is murdered, and further investigation into Rothstein reveals an elaborate Ponzi scheme bilking unsuspecting victims.

5.title: Pastor Matt Baker: Twist of Faith

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: When popular Pastor in Waco TX's wife commits suicide after the death of their baby daughter, everyone sympathizes with the grieving man of God. Then surprising revelations involving a mistress and a plot for murder lands casts a new light on the Pastor.

6.title: West Memphis Three

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: When the dead bodies of three young boys turn up in a ditch, the town of West Memphis is turned upside down. Law enforcement arrests and tries three teenage boys, despite the fact that no solid evidence ties the teenagers to this horrific crime.

7.title: Ryan Jenkins: Casting a Killer

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: What pushed Ryan Jenkins over the edge? Jenkins was a contestant on a reality TV dating show, and after his elimination by the female host, murdered a woman whom resembled her.

8.title: Amanda Lewis: A Tragic Testimony

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Did a 7-year old girl accidentally drown or was it an unthinkable murder committed by her own mother? The guilt and innocence of Amanda Lewis is weighed as Aphrodite delves into this heartwrenching case and unravels a mystery containing many twists.

9.title: Glen Taylor Helzer: Children of Thunder

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Taylor Helzer was a self-professed prophet of God who led his emerging cult, "Children of Thunder" on a murder spree. Aphrodite Jones digs deep into the character of the group's charismatic leader to illuminate his decent into darkness.

10.title: Betty Broderick: A Woman Scorned

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Betty Broderick became "the woman scorned" when her husband, Dan, left her for a younger woman. Betty responded by killing Dan and his new young bride. Twenty-one years later, Aphrodite interviews Betty and learns what drove her to murder.

1.title: Sex and Death in the OC

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: When millionaire Bill McLaughlin landed himself a sexy live-in girlfriend, he thought life would get better. But his girlfriend and her lover had other ideas. Aphrodite follows a roller-coaster ride through a sensational crime of greed, lust and betrayal.

2.title: Casey Anthony: Bella Vita

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: We're all familiar with the tragic death of Caylee Anthony and her mother's bizarre lies about it. Like many, Aphrodite was outraged when party-hard single mom Casey was found innocent. But what did the jury see that so many others missed?

3.title: To Catch a Killer

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: In Colorado, Detectives don't take long to identify the main suspect in a young woman's disappearance, but they can't prove it. And when another young woman is nearly killed in a fiery blaze, police have to scramble -or risk a serial killer on the loose.

4.title: Chosen to Kill

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: Wall Street motivational speaker Jeffrey Locker is found fatally stabbed in his car, parked in the projects of East Harlem, NY. What was he doing there? Aphrodite Jones talks to his killer, and uncovers an unbelievable tale.

5.title: A Bite, a Bullet and a Broken Heart

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: The mysterious murder of a newlywed nurse looks like a tragic break-in gone wrong. But when a DNA analysis is done years later, it points to a female killer. Aphrodite finds out why the killer's family thinks they got the wrong woman.

6.title: Loved to Death

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: When a doctor comes home between surgeries on Valentine's Day to surprise his wife with a card, he instead finds her lying beaten to death in a pool of blood. But as Aphrodite Jones finds out, nothing in this murder case is what it appears.

7.title: Blood Money

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: The true story behind the murder of Miami millionaire and heir to the Fontainbelu Hotel fortune: Ben Novack Jr.

8.title: Girl, Gone

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: Aphrodite Jones looks into the case of Kristin Smart, who disappeared off the Cal Poly campus in 1996.

9.title: Burning Passions

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: Aphrodite explores the controversial murder case of Green Bay WI housewife Sandra Maloney, discovered burned up in her home. Was it suicide? Or murder?

10.title: Confessions and Lies

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Aphrodite looks into a case in the suburbs of Chicago, where five young men are convicted of raping and killing a 14-year-old girl named Cateresa Matthews. Were the convictions of "the Dixmoor 5" valid?

1.title: Sins of the Father

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: In Pennsylvania, Methodist minister AB Schirmer is beloved by his congregation. Which is why it's such a tragedy when he loses his wife in a freak automobile accident. But was it really an accident? Aphrodite Jones gets the full story.

2.title: Good People, Badlands

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Glendive, Montana is shocked when mother Susan Casey goes missing after a date. Detectives realize that three men are in her life, any one of whom might have done the unthinkable. Aphrodite Jones follows this twisted tale to its shocking conclusion.

3.title: Taylor's Tale

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: VA college freshman Taylor Behl goes missing after just days on campus, and her mother's worst fears are realized. A relationship based largely on the Internet has proven fatal. Aphrodite Jones gets the full story-interviewing Taylor's killer in prison.

4.title: Sex, Death and Videotape

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

4.plot: The tragic story of Michelle Le, a San Francisco Bay area nursing student who went missing in 2011. Michelle's decomposed body was found months later in a shallow grave. The story explores the circumstance and evidence of the crime. Her former friend and fellow student Giselle Esteban was convicted of murder.

5.title: Paging Dr. Essa

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Rosemarie and Dr. Yazeed Essa lead a seemingly happy, family-filled life in the suburbs of Cleveland. Until one day - on her way to the movies - Rosemarie slumps over behind the wheel, apparently the victim of a heart attack. But in a case that spans years and continents - the truth cause of her death is hardly that simple.

6.title: The Mystery of Steve McNair

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: NFL superstar Steve McNair is found shot to death in his downtown apartment, a beautiful woman also lying dead at his feet. Nashville police are quick to rule his death a murder-suicide. But Aphrodite Jones isn't so sure...

7.title: A Hollywood Hit

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: Hollywood stuntman Garrett Warren opens his door one evening only to be confronted by a gunman who fires at point blank range. Miraculously, Garrett survives. But will whoever tried to kill him strike again? Aphrodite Jones explores a case that's stranger-than-Hollywood-fiction.

8.title: Never Too Late

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: When Florida Detective Donna Velazquez was assigned the case of David Jackson, who'd been missing for years, she knew it was just a way of Â'testing' the rookie. But with determination, she winds up solving the case, unveiling a sinister murder plot.

9.title: The Ballad of Billi Jo

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: When a house fire takes the lives of Wayne and Billi Jo Smallwood's two young children, everyone on the Fort Campbell military base is grief-stricken for them. But when it turns out the fire was intentionally set - grief turns to outrage.

10.title: Devil at the Daycare

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: Rusty Sneiderman and his wife Andrea lead a comfortable life in the Atlanta suburb of Dunwoody. But just after he drops off their youngest at the daycare one day, Rusty is gunned down right there in the parking lot.

11.title: A Deadly Downfall

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

11.plot: Amanda Ross is gunned down outside her apartment in Lexington, Kentucky. Police only have one suspec, the scion of the politically powerful Nunn family, Steve Nunn.

12.title: The Cleveland Conundrum

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

12.plot: Matthew Podolak is a young man in his prime. So when he arrives in the emergency room keeled over with abdominal pains, doctors are at a loss as to what's happened. Within hours, he's dead. And the autopsy results only deepen the mystery.

13.title: Murder on Route 91

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

13.plot: Just before midnight, Nuzzio Begaren and his wife, corrections officer Elizabeth Begaren, pull off Route 91. The couple is concerned about the menacing men that are following them. In the ensuing confrontation, Elizabeth is gunned down in cold blood.

1.title: Guilty Until Proven Innocent

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: When a driven investigative reporter in Chicago is asked to look into the unsolved murder of a local teacher, she discovers a series of coincidences that point not only to a suspect in this murder, but in two other murders as well.

2.title: A Halloween Horror Story

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: A teenage girl is found brutally stabbed to death the morning after she leaves to go to a Halloween party. Now fifteen years later, her parents are more determined than ever to see all of her killers get justice. Aphrodite Jones gets the full story.

3.title: A New Set of Eyes

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: In New York, a teenage boy vanishes without a trace after sneaking out one night to meet up with friends. Did Joey run away? Or could he have met with a much more tragic end? Aphrodite Jones gets the full story.

5.title: Joey Martin

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Father Doesn't Know Best

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: A young man is killed at his father's home in Central New York when the truck he is working on falls off its jack and crushes his chest. What at first appears to be a tragic accident soon reveals itself as something much more sinister.

7.title: Broken Commandments

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

7.plot: A parishioner is shot to death while working in the office of her church in Bucks County, Pennsylvania. The murder sends reverberations throughout the church. Was she killed at random, or was it personal? Aphrodite Jones tells the story.

8.title: Cold Case in Hotlanta

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: In the Atlanta area, a man is executed at point blank range in a partially completed housing subdivision. But the Alabama native had only been in town a few hours before he was killed. Was it business or personal? Aphrodite tells the full story.

9.title: Virtual Drive-By

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

9.plot: In California, a woman disappears without a trace. Police suspect her roommate knows more than he claims, but without any hard evidence they become locked in a vicious game of cat and mouse. Aphrodite Jones uncovers a tale of fatal obsession and murder.

10.title: Every Move She Makes

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

10.plot: A woman in a small town is the target of a terrifying and insidious stalker. When she goes missing, police must prove she was killed -- without a body. Aphrodite Jones goes inside the investigation to shed light on a case filled with twists and turns.

-1.title: Memories of Murder

episode of.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones (TV Series 2010– )

-1.plot: A woman's torso is found floating inside a garbage bag off Key Biscayne, Florida. The identity of the woman remains a mystery for nearly twenty-five years until two grown sisters come forward and tell police about abuse they endured - and where it ended.

imdb.plot outline: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones follows one of the nation's top crime writer, Aphrodite Jones, as she goes behind the scenes of famous murder cases to uncover hidden secrets and new information to shed new light on these sensational stories.
imdb.title: True Crime with Aphrodite Jones
plot: _True Crime with Aphrodite Jones_ (qv) follows one of the nation's top crime writer, Aphrodite Jones, as she goes behind the scenes of famous murder cases to uncover hidden secrets and new information to shed new light on these sensational stories.
